author: PTI
title: Markets to track virus updates for cues: Analysts
description: Markets will be closed on Monday for 'Mahavir Jayanti' and on Friday for 'Good Friday'.
content:
New Delhi: Equity market sentiment will continue to be driven by the trend in coronavirus cases globally as well as in India, analysts said, adding that indices may see high volatility in the holiday-shortened week ahead.
